# General Notes


# Fellingham Notes
- For Gamma distributions, prefers shape > 1 so the curve "flips over" as shown below
```{r}
curve(dgamma(x,1,.1),from=0,to=40)
curve(dgamma(x,1.1,.1),from=0,to=40,add=TRUE, col="red")
```
